event.title: FSCONS, Gothenburg, Sweden
event.body:
FSFE will organise the "Free Software and Politics" track, which will consist of three talks and a workshop:
- Talk: Non-free software advertising presented by your government, by Matthias Kirschner.
- Talk: The water in which we swim. Policy issues around Free Software, by FSFE's President Karsten Gerloff.
- Talk: Catch them early. Free software in Education, by FSFE's Education team coordinator Guido Arnold.
- Talk: Free Software in the Swedish public sector, by Daniel Melin from the Statens inköpscentral, the central procurement facility for the Swedish public sector.
- Workshop: Hands-on decentralization with PageKite workshop by Bjarni Rúnar Einarsson.
Registration is still possible on fscons.org, Fellows obtain a 10 Euro discount on the Registration fee.
